sorry……"},{"lineNumber":244635,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph."},{"lineNumber":244636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……変わった方々ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"...You're quite strange people, aren't you?"},{"lineNumber":244637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、行きましょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, shall we go?"},{"lineNumber":244638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、なにを勝手に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, what are you deciding on your eccentric."},{"lineNumber":244651,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":244652,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":244653,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が出口を探して歩いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance What is this?"},{"lineNumber":244673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Wait..."},{"lineNumber":244674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おいおい、なんだこの数は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-Hey, hey, what’s with this number!"},{"lineNumber":244675,"originalJapaneseLine":"群れとなったハチ女が","translatedEnglishLine":"A swarm of Bee Girls"},{"lineNumber":244676,"originalJapaneseLine":"次から次へその場に集まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"gathered there one after another."},{"lineNumber":244677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハチ女の大群……」","translatedEnglishLine":"A huge swarm of Bee Girls……"},{"lineNumber":244678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「モンスターはお前らの仲間だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters are your allies, right?"},{"lineNumber":244679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうにかしろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do something about it."},{"lineNumber":244680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ダメダメ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, no!"},{"lineNumber":244681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの子達めちゃくちゃ怒ってる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Those girls are really angry!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和的に済むならそれが一番――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it can be settled peacefully, that's the best――
it might be a bit troublesome.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいたっ！　ひんひん、すみません……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, what are you deciding on your own...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「道はこの先にしか通じてません。
貴方達はここに残るのですか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will walk at the front!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が歩くんじゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re not the one who walks there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ズイッとランスが学者の前に出た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance suddenly stepped out in front of the scholar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先頭が彼でいいんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it okay for him to be in the lead?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その男はそういう者なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That man is that kind of person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が出口を探して歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others were walking, searching for an exit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランスとマエリータ隊の隊長が

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Lance, may I ask you something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだ、敵の癖に声かけるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What is it? Don't talk to me, you're the enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故、自分に仲間がついてくるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you ever thought about why companions follow you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方は考えたことがありますか？」
「はあ？　見て分からんのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Can't you tell just by looking?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が最強無敵の英雄だからだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's because I am the strongest and invincible hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何を笑っとるんだ、気持ち悪い」
そのとき女の子モンスターの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the female monster

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おいおい、なんだこの数は！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Hey, hey, what’s with this number!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 群れとなったハチ女が
次から次へその場に集まる。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge swarm of Bee Girls……

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「モンスターはお前らの仲間だろう。
あの子達めちゃくちゃ怒ってる！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
